overview: Rahimi (Aqasha) works as mutawif in an Umrah agencies. Farhana his wife is pregnant. Umrah pilgrims this time to test the faith Rahimi where he is seduced by a girl named Love (Neelofa) who joined the group after a break fiancee, Zahren (Nazim Othman) was a popular actress arrogant wants to step into Mecca for the holiday. Possible Rahimi refrain from being seduced by Love
title: Tersalah Cinta
